library(geneBasisR)
set.seed(32)

root.dir = "/Users/alsu/Develop/geneBasis/"

#source(paste0(root.dir , "am_geneBasis/functions/main_functions.R"))


system = "mouse_motorcortex"
sce = readRDS(paste0("/nfs/research/marioni/alsu/External/Azimuth/" , system, ".rds"))
sce = retain_informative_genes(sce)

# only leave the ones w/ entries in seqfish

# Iterative gene search

```{r iterative-gene-search, message = FALSE}


n_genes_total = 250
genes = geneBasisR::gene_search(sce , genes_base = NULL, n_genes_total = n_genes_total, batch = "orig.ident", n.neigh = 5, nPC.all = 50, nPC.selection = 100, verbose = F)
saveRDS(genes , paste0(root.dir , "data/gene_selection/" , system , "/" , "gene_selection", ".Rds"))


```
